title: Survey on amount of money spent on boating in the U.S. 2012
summary: This statistic presents the distribution of amount over_$5000 breach incidents in the first half of 2012 , sorted 2012 Yearly .
That year , $2000_to_$4999 attacks accounted for 18.3 percentage of over_$5000 spent that year .
Identity under_500$ accounted for 30.5 percentage of over_$5000 spent worldwide .
gold: The statistic depicts the amount of money boat owners in the U.S. spent on boating in 2012 . 18.3 percent of the respondents stated that they spent between $ 1,000 and $ 1,999 on boating in 2012 .
